queries.Get procedures with prefix (PostgreSQL): SELECT DISTINCT identifier AS "Identifier", proceduredescriptionformat AS "Format", descriptionxml AS "Description" FROM procedure AS p, proceduredescriptionformat AS pdf, validproceduretime AS vpt WHERE p.proceduredescriptionformatid = pdf.proceduredescriptionformatid AND p.procedureid = vpt.procedureid AND identifier LIKE 'http://www.52north.org/test%';
queries.Get all Features of Interest (PostgreSQL: SELECT DISTINCT identifier AS "Identifier", ST_ASTEXT(geom) AS "Geometry", ST_SRID(geom) AS "SRID" FROM featureofinterest;
queries.Get Observation Types for Offerings (Pos: SELECT DISTINCT o.identifier AS "Offering", ot.observationtype AS "Type" FROM offering AS o, observationtype AS ot, observationconstellation AS oc WHERE o.offeringid = oc.offeringid AND oc.observationtypeid = ot.observationtypeid;
queries.Get the latest numeric observations (Pos: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", u.unit AS "Unit", v.value AS "Value" FROM observation AS o, series AS s, featureofinterest AS f, offering AS of, procedure AS p, observableproperty AS op, unit AS u, numericvalue AS v, observationhasoffering oho WHERE o.seriesid = s.seriesid AND f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest boolean observations (Pos: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM observation AS o, series AS s, featureofinterest AS f, offering AS of, procedure AS p, observableproperty AS op, booleanvalue AS v, observationhasoffering oho WHERE o.seriesid = s.seriesid AND f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest count observations (Postg: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM observation AS o, series AS s, featureofinterest AS f, offering AS of, procedure AS p, observableproperty AS op, countvalue AS v, observationhasoffering oho WHERE o.seriesid = s.seriesid AND f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest text observations (Postgr: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM observation AS o, series AS s, featureofinterest AS f, offering AS of, procedure AS p, observableproperty AS op, unit AS u, textvalue AS v, observationhasoffering oho WHERE o.seriesid = s.seriesid AND f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest category observations (Po: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM observation AS o, series AS s, featureofinterest AS f, offering AS of, procedure AS p, observableproperty AS op, unit AS u, categoryvalue AS v, observationhasoffering oho WHERE o.seriesid = s.seriesid AND f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest SweDataArray observations: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM observation AS o, series AS s, featureofinterest AS f, offering AS of, procedure AS p, observableproperty AS op, unit AS u, swedataarrayvalue AS v, observationhasoffering oho WHERE o.seriesid = s.seriesid AND f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest numeric observations (Pos: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", u.unit AS "Unit", v.value AS "Value" FROM observation AS o, featureofinterest AS f, offering AS of, procedure AS p, observableproperty AS op, unit AS u, numericvalue AS v, observationhasoffering oho WHERE f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest boolean observations (Pos: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM observation AS o, featureofinterest AS f, offering AS of, procedure AS p, observableproperty AS op, booleanvalue AS v, observationhasoffering oho WHERE f.featureofinterestid = o.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = o.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = o.observablepropertyid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest count observations (Postg: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM observation AS o, featureofinterest AS f, offering AS of, procedure AS p, observableproperty AS op, countvalue AS v, observationhasoffering oho WHERE f.featureofinterestid = o.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = o.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = o.observablepropertyid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest text observations (Postgr: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM observation AS o, featureofinterest AS f, offering AS of, procedure AS p, observableproperty AS op, unit AS u, textvalue AS v, observationhasoffering oho WHERE f.featureofinterestid  = o.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = o.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = o.observablepropertyid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest category observations (Po: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM observation AS o, featureofinterest AS f, offering AS of, procedure AS p, observableproperty AS op, unit AS u, categoryvalue AS v, observationhasoffering oho WHERE f.featureofinterestid = o.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = o.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = o.observablepropertyid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest SweDataArray observations: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM observation AS o, featureofinterest AS f, offering AS of, procedure AS p, observableproperty AS op, unit AS u, swedataarrayvalue AS v, observationhasoffering oho WHERE f.featureofinterestid = o.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = o.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = o.observablepropertyid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get procedures with prefix (MySQL): SELECT DISTINCT identifier AS "Identifier", proceduredescriptionformat AS "Format", descriptionxml AS "Description" FROM sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.proceduredescriptionformat AS pdf, sos.validproceduretime AS vpt WHERE p.proceduredescriptionformatid = pdf.proceduredescriptionformatid AND p.procedureid = vpt.procedureid AND identifier LIKE 'http://www.52north.org/test%';
queries.Get all Features of Interest (MySQL): SELECT DISTINCT identifier AS "Identifier", ST_ASTEXT(geom) AS "Geometry", ST_SRID(geom) AS "SRID" FROM sos.featureofinterest;
queries.Get Observation Types for Offerings (MyS: SELECT DISTINCT o.identifier AS "Offering", ot.observationtype AS "Type" FROM sos.offering AS o, sos.observationtype AS ot, sos.observationconstellation AS oc WHERE o.offeringid = oc.offeringid AND oc.observationtypeid = ot.observationtypeid;
queries.Get the latest numeric observations (MyS: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", u.unit AS "Unit", v.value AS "Value" FROM sos.observation AS o, sos.series AS s, sos.featureofinterest AS f, sos.offering AS of, sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.observableproperty AS op, sos.unit AS u, sos.numericvalue AS v, sos.observationhasoffering oho WHERE o.seriesid = s.seriesid AND f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest boolean observations (MyS: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM sos.observation AS o, sos.series AS s, sos.featureofinterest AS f, sos.offering AS of, sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.observableproperty AS op, sos.unit AS u, sos.booleanvalue AS v, sos.observationhasoffering oho WHERE o.seriesid = s.seriesid AND f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest count observations (MySQL: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM sos.observation AS o, sos.series AS s, sos.featureofinterest AS f, sos.offering AS of, sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.observableproperty AS op, sos.unit AS u, sos.countvalue AS v, sos.observationhasoffering oho WHERE o.seriesid = s.seriesid AND f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest text observations (MySQL/: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM sos.observation AS o, sos.series AS s, sos.featureofinterest AS f, sos.offering AS of, sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.observableproperty AS op, sos.unit AS u, sos.textvalue AS v, sos.observationhasoffering oho WHERE o.seriesid = s.seriesid AND f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest category observations (My: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM sos.observation AS o, sos.series AS s, sos.featureofinterest AS f, sos.offering AS of, sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.observableproperty AS op, sos.unit AS u, sos.categoryvalue AS v, sos.observationhasoffering oho WHERE o.seriesid = s.seriesid AND f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest SweDataArray observations: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM sos.observation AS o, sos.series AS s, sos.featureofinterest AS f, sos.offering AS of, sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.observableproperty AS op, sos.unit AS u, sos.swedataarrayvalue AS v, sos.observationhasoffering oho WHERE o.seriesid = s.seriesid AND f.featureofinterestid = s.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = s.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = s.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest numeric observations (MyS: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", u.unit AS "Unit", v.value AS "Value" FROM sos.observation AS o, sos.featureofinterest AS f, sos.offering AS of, sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.observableproperty AS op, sos.unit AS u, sos.numericvalue AS v, sos.observationhasoffering oho WHERE f.featureofinterestid = o.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = o.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = o.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest boolean observations (MyS: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM sos.observation AS o, sos.featureofinterest AS f, sos.offering AS of, sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.observableproperty AS op, sos.unit AS u, sos.booleanvalue AS v, sos.observationhasoffering oho WHERE f.featureofinterestid = o.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = o.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = o.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest count observations (MySQL: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM sos.observation AS o, sos.featureofinterest AS f, sos.offering AS of, sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.observableproperty AS op, sos.unit AS u, sos.countvalue AS v, sos.observationhasoffering oho WHERE f.featureofinterestid = o.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = o.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = o.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest text observations (MySQL/: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM sos.observation AS o, sos.featureofinterest AS f, sos.offering AS of, sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.observableproperty AS op, sos.unit AS u, sos.textvalue AS v, sos.observationhasoffering oho WHERE f.featureofinterestid = o.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = o.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = o.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest category observations (My: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM sos.observation AS o, sos.featureofinterest AS f, sos.offering AS of, sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.observableproperty AS op, sos.unit AS u, sos.categoryvalue AS v, sos.observationhasoffering oho WHERE f.featureofinterestid = o.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = o.procedureid AND op.observablepropertyid = o.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
queries.Get the latest SweDataArray observations: SELECT DISTINCT p.identifier AS "Procedure", f.identifier AS "FeatureofInterest", op.identifier AS "ObservedProperty", of.identifier AS "Offering", o.phenomenontimestart AS "BeginTime", o.phenomenontimeend AS "EndTime", v.value AS "Value" FROM sos.observation AS o, sos.featureofinterest AS f, sos.offering AS of, sos.`procedure` AS p, sos.observableproperty AS op, sos.unit AS u, sos.swedataarrayvalue AS v, sos.observationhasoffering oho WHERE f.featureofinterestid = o.featureofinterestid AND of.offeringid = oho.offeringid AND oho.observationid = o.observationid AND p.procedureid = o.procedureid AND  p.observablepropertyid = o.observablepropertyid AND u.unitid = o.unitid AND o.observationid = v.observationid ORDER BY o.phenomenontimestart ASC LIMIT 10;
